page.title: 09Transport
page.content: There is no regular bus service except for the school buses and the postbus. The School bus only runs on School days.The Morpeth High School bus leaves at 07.30 and returns at 16.30 The Rothbury Middle School bus leaves at 08.15 and returns at 16.00.The post-bus leaves at 11.30 and comes back at 15.15 .It leaves again at 16.40. Most families have a car. Most of the children travel into school by car.One car covers up the Coquet,Alwin Valley and Clennell area, one the Dueshill and Holystone area and the other the Sharperton and Holystone area.Some parents living within the two mile radius transport their own children. The nearest railway station is at Alnmouth, and airport at Newcastle.
